title: Mr. Attaf receives a phone call from his Saudi counterpart
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ahmed Attaf received a phone call from his brother the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, brother country, his Highness Prince Faisal Ben Farhan Ben Abdullah Al Saud who congratulated him on his appointment as head of the Algerian diplomacy, wishing him full success in the accomplishment of his missions.

The two parties reviewed, on this occasion, the Algerian-Saudi relations marked by a historical asset made of the most beautiful illustrations of brotherhood, cooperation, solidarity and mutual support between the two countries and peoples, expressing their willingness to work together to ensure the proper preparation of the next bilateral events to serve the common objectives in the political and economic fields.

The two ministers expressed their satisfaction with the great convergence of the positions of the two brotherly countries around the main issues of common interest at the regional and international levels, stressing the importance of continuing efforts to strengthen joint Arab action, especially since Saudi Arabia will be entrusted with the presidency of the Arab summit by Algeria during the next summit in Riyadh.
